amendment.description: Amendment transfers $3.6 million from the Internal Revenue Service to the salaries and expenses account of the Customs Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the IRS by $3.6 million and to increase funding for salaries and expenses of the Customs Service by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
